item.title: Change the position of the bloc in order pages
item.description: Change the position of the bloc in order pages Steps Step Description Expected result Select principal column" " A message should be display in green Go to the front office add a product in the cart and check the cart The bloc reassurance should be display Select None" " A message should be display in green Go to the front office add a product in the cart and check the cart The bloc reassurance shouldn’t be display
